DOC.brief_title: Double-method Comparative Study Order Predict Use Co-receptors From Type 1 HIV : Phenotypic Study ( Trofile ESTA® ) Virologic Response CCR5 Antagonist Short Term
DOC.criteria: Patients willing give , sign date Informed Consent Form participate Study donate sample cell molecular Studies , receive appropriate information Study design , main objective Study potential risk . Patients age > 18 . Patients chronic HIV infection Patients previous HAART ( naïve patient ) . Patients meet HAART start criterion . Viral load > 1.000 HIV RNA copies/mL Patients able understand Study objectives able perform frequent visit Study Site . Prior HAART ( regardless HAART type ) . Pregnancy willingness get pregnant Study .
